attributes.action: Condemn Bernie the Bolt for continually peeing himself when visiting the Liverpool FC Newsgroup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's natural as one gets older to suffer from water problems. However, Bernie the Bolt delights in informing the Liverpool FC Newsgroup as to how many times he has wet himself. Mr Blair, I voted you into office and I demand that Bernie is fitted with man nappies. The smell on the Liverpool FC Newsgroup is becoming intolerable

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
